description: Structured information describing how two anatomical entities relate to each other.

confidence._instruction: Add a semantic confidence level for the stated relation between the two anatomical entities.

inRelationTo._instruction: Add the anatomical entity to which the relation is described.

percentalOverlap._instruction: Enter the overlap between the two anatomical entities expressed in percentage.

semanticRelation._instruction: Add the semantic term that best describes the relation between the two anatomical entities.
